name: Pelvic Model
specification: Life-sized plastic model with labeled and detachable sections depicting pelvic bones, ligaments, vessels, nerves, and reproductive organs; designed to provide 3D spatial understanding.
function: Facilitates teaching and understanding of pelvic anatomy including bones, muscles, and internal organs; supports hands-on learning and demonstration of anatomical relationships.
usage: Use detachable parts to demonstrate anatomical structures and their relations; engage students in assembling and disassembling for improved spatial comprehension; store safely to avoid deformation.
maintenance: Clean gently with a soft cloth; avoid exposure to strong impacts or direct sunlight; store in protective cases to preserve integrity.
warning: Handle with care to prevent cracking or damage; excessive force or dropping may compromise model components; keep away from solvents or harsh chemicals.
